sense.gloss: overlap width, margin for pasting together (e.g. two pieces of paper)
elbowroom, leeway, room, margin, allowance, latitude
clotted blood, gore, sticky clots of blood
patching up (e.g. a failure), covering up (e.g. a mistake), glossing over

sdata.j: いったい↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓なのか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓なのか、↑曖昧↑↓あいまい↓↑模糊↑↓もこ↓とした↑意見↑↓いけん↓だねえ。
sdata.e: That doesn't make it clear at all whether you're for it or against it.

sdata.j: ↑申↑↓もう↓し↑込↑↓こ↓み↑用紙↑↓ようし↓に↑糊↑↓のり↓で↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑貼↑↓は↓りなさい。
sdata.e: Glue the photograph to your application form.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はメモをドアに↑糊↑↓のり↓で↑貼↑↓は↓った。
sdata.e: He pasted the notice on the door.

sdata.j: ↑制服↑↓せいふく↓だって、いつも↑着↑↓き↓ているのより↑糊↑↓のり↓がきき↑過↑↓す↓ぎていて、ちょっぴり↑違和感↑↓いわかん↓すら↑覚↑↓おぼ↓えてしまいます。
sdata.e: Come to that the uniform had a bit more starch than that I usually wear, it's a bit uncomfortable.
